definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Sheldon:Only nine more months to comic-con.
sentences.chinese: 還有九個月就到動漫盛會了。

sentences.english: For China, the upcoming GTI launch is a noticeable event.
sentences.chinese: 即將在中國舉行的GTI發佈當是盛會一場。

sentences.english: At this2- day event, a different theme will be carefully selected each year on this management discipline.
sentences.chinese: 每年，這個兩天的盛會的主題都會有創新與變化。

sentences.english: Second, China is for the first time ever, the biggest China international rum event.
sentences.chinese: 是中國有史以來第一次最大的中國國際糖酒盛會。

sentences.english: More than a few of us do not know the difference between black-tie or white-tie events.
sentences.chinese: 但很多人卻不知着黑領結或白領結盛會的不同之處。

sentences.english: This is a time to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今晚是一個歡慶的盛會。

sentences.english: Life is a grand event, participate in it fully.
sentences.chinese: 人生就是一場盛會，充分地參與進來吧。

sentences.english: The great pageant of thee and me has overspread the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你我的盛會蔓延到天際。

sentences.english: The closing ceremony is one big party.
sentences.chinese: 閉幕式也是一個大的盛會。

sentences.english: Good evening and a big welcome to this special and  festive gathering.
sentences.chinese: 大家晚上好，歡迎各位蒞臨今晚盛會。

sentences.english: Some high-level persons from the government also visited the event.
sentences.chinese: 中國國家高級領導人也屆臨了此次盛會。

sentences.english: Bagpipes and dancing open the competitions of local sporting events, which are called Highland Gatherings.
sentences.chinese: 高地風笛與利爾舞揭開了高地運動盛會的序幕。

sentences.english: The Beijing Paralympic Games is also a grand gathering for people with a disability from across the globe.
sentences.chinese: 北京殘奧會是全世界殘疾人的盛會。

sentences.english: The carnival is the final big party before the penitential season of Lent begins.
sentences.chinese: 狂歡節是四旬齋之前的最後狂歡盛會。

sentences.english: Hundreds of hounds participated in the event this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年一共有數百隻獵狐犬參加這一盛會。

sentences.english: There’s a bit of propaganda in any pageant.
sentences.chinese: 任何盛會都會有點宣傳成分。

definition: conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
to get together all at once
